rows.label: qst100702_msg0001
rows.name:
One Nopon Doubloon... two
Nopon Doubloons... where are
the Nopon Doubloons, mo?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0002
rows.name: What! You collected all 11, mo?!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0003
rows.name:
Nuinui's judgment in asking
you was correct, mo!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0004
rows.name:
Put the collected Nopon
Doubloons into the hole in
the treasure chest, mo!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0005
rows.name:
One... two... three... four...
five... six... seven...
eight... nine... ten...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0006
rows.name:
Eleven! ...Now, it will
finally open, mo!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0007
rows.name:
What's inside, mo...?
What's inside... mo?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0008
rows.name:
These are expensive accessories and
core chips, mo! Super expensive
items, mo! I can buy a ship, mo!!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0009
rows.name:
...Hm? There's a piece
of paper inside, mo.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0010
rows.name:
'IOU To the Chairman of the
Pignerator Trade Guild'

rows.label: qst100702_msg0011
rows.name: 'I have borrowed 1,000,000G.'

rows.label: qst100702_msg0012
rows.name:
That's a scary number written there,
mo... Whose debt is this, mo?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0013
rows.name: 'I will definitely repay it. - Seiryuu'

rows.label: qst100702_msg0014
rows.name:
Seiryuu? I've heard that
somewhere before...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0015
rows.name:
To think that such an
IOU still existed!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0016
rows.name:
I was younger back then! Well,
I looked a bit older...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0017
rows.name: Gramps! A debt... what is this about?!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0018
rows.name:
Well, you see, um... I must
have been short on money.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0019
rows.name: Mo? Is that little one Seiryuu-san, mo?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0020
rows.name:
That's right! For certain
reasons, I have taken on a
younger form, but I am Seiryuu!!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0021
rows.name: Aah!! I remember now, mo!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0022
rows.name:
When I was little, my grandma
told me a fairy tale...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0023
rows.name:
It was about lending money to a
Divine Beast named Seiryuu, mo!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0024
rows.name: It wasn't a fairy tale, mo~!!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0025
rows.name:
A fairy tale about lending money...
That's the money-grubbing Pignerator
Trade Guild for you!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0026
rows.name:
This is no time to be
impressed, Gramps!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0027
rows.name: Did you pay back this money?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0028
rows.name: ...I have not.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0029
rows.name: I thought so...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0030
rows.name:
The treasures from before are
Seiryuu-san's collateral, mo.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0031
rows.name:
Nuinui can't just sell them
off and cash them in, mo...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0032
rows.name:
My dream of reviving the
Pignerator Trade Guild...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0033
rows.name: Gramps.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0034
rows.name: Wh-what is it?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0035
rows.name:
You borrowed this money
because you needed it, right?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0036
rows.name:
O-of course! I borrowed
it using these precious
treasures as collateral!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0037
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] I can't say it was to
spoil my girlfriend...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0038
rows.name: ...I understand.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0039
rows.name: Nuinui-san, I will repay this debt.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0040
rows.name: Rex?! It's 1,000,000G, you know!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0041
rows.name:
We could just hand over the
treasure and cancel the contract.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0042
rows.name:
Salvager's Code, number 7:
Always return what you borrow!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0043
rows.name: Rex...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0044
rows.name: That code is very wonderful, mo!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0045
rows.name:
1,000,000G! I'll have you
pay it back in full, mo!!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0046
rows.name:
I'll definitely pay it
back! Right, Gramps?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0047
rows.name: I'm sorry... Rex...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0048
rows.name:
Let Nuinui know when you
have the money, mo.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0049
rows.name:
Until then, Nuinui will study
the business techniques of
the hateful Bahn, mo.
